name: Taggd
description: Taggd is a Digital Recruitment Platform that provides Ready-to-Hire talent to India Inc. Combining the power of human knowledge and data, Taggd has successfully fulfilled talent mandates of more than 100+ Clients and ensured hiring managers’ success for half a million jobs from over 14+ sectors. With a vision to fulfil 1 Million Jobs through our talent platform by 2025, we strive to connect people with people, people with companies, and People With Opportunities. Just right. Every time.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Dream Jobs. Best Talent. Find it all at Taggd.
ShortDescription: It’s not just a belief. It is our way of working. And we do that by democratizing the art and science of hiring talent.
enhanced_description: Taggd is a Digital Recruitment Platform specializing in providing Ready-to-Hire talent to India Inc. The platform integrates human knowledge with data-driven insights to streamline the hiring process. Taggd has a proven track record, having successfully fulfilled over half a million jobs for more than 100 clients across 14+ sectors. With an ambitious vision to fulfill 1 Million jobs by 2025, Taggd aims to democratize the art and science of talent acquisition, ensuring the right fit by connecting individuals with opportunities and companies with top talent.
key_use_cases: Sourcing and provision of ready-to-hire talent
Conducting background checks and reference checks
Managing applicant tracking (ATS) for job applications
Improving overall hiring speed and efficiency
competitive_advantages: Combines human knowledge with data for improved talent matching
Offers 'Ready-to-Hire' talent, implying pre-vetted or highly suitable candidates
Transparent pricing model with 'No Hidden Costs'
Provides 'Exclusive Jobs Opportunities' for candidates, indicating a strong employer network
Focus on 'democratizing' hiring talent, suggesting accessibility and efficiency improvements for clients
roi_benefits: Improved success rate for hiring managers
compliance_features: Data privacy features (e.g., 'We Value Your Privacy')
scalability_features: Demonstrated ability to fulfill half a million jobs for 100+ clients
Strategic vision to fulfill 1 Million jobs by 2025, indicating platform capacity for growth
